personal.name: Anish Basety
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.summary: Passionate software engineer with expertise in full-stack development, AI/ML, and creating innovative solutions. Currently pursuing Computer Science & Mathematics at UIUC with a focus on scalable systems and emerging technologies.

experience.description: Conducting advanced research in artificial intelligence, focusing on novel algorithms and machine learning applications.
achievements: Developed and optimized AI models for natural language processing tasks, achieving state-of-the-art results
Published research papers on innovative AI techniques in leading conferences
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into real-world products
Mentored junior researchers on AI methodologies and best practices

experience.description: Developing and evaluating AI/ML models for various applications, with a focus on large language models and API testing.
achievements: Developed robust API testing frameworks for AI models, ensuring high reliability and performance
Evaluated and fine-tuned large language models (LLM) for specific use cases, improving accuracy by 15%
Implemented machine learning algorithms using Swift and XML for mobile and web applications
Contributed to the design and implementation of neural networks for complex data analysis

experience.description: Engineered backend systems for managing speaker metadata and talk content, and refactored legacy code for improved maintainability.
achievements: Built Django-based backend endpoints to manage speaker metadata, talk transcripts, and tag relationships, enabling structured content retrieval and streamlining editorial workflows.
Wrote custom PostgreSQL queries and schema migrations to normalize talk data, enforce referential integrity, and support advanced filtering logic for the TED.com content API.
Refactored legacy code into modular services with unit tests and CI linting pipelines, improving maintainability and deployment reliability across TED’s web and mobile platforms.

experience.description: Conducted quantitative research on socio-economic factors and happiness rankings, utilizing advanced statistical methods.
achievements: Performed multivariate OLS and log-linear regressions in Stata and R to quantify the marginal impact of GDP per capita on happiness rankings using 2019 World Happiness Report data.
Conducted Breusch-Pagan and White tests for heteroskedasticity, corrected for non-constant variance using robust standard errors, and evaluated model fit through adjusted R² and residual diagnostics.
Engineered reproducible scripts and automated cleaning pipelines to standardize country-level economic and well-being data, ensuring consistent input formats and minimizing manual preprocessing.

experience.description: Developed real-time video annotation components and optimized API performance for a video analysis platform.
achievements: Developed frame-synchronized video annotation components in React and TypeScript, enabling users to interact with AI-generated insights overlaid on video timelines in real time.
Implemented custom WebSocket hooks to deliver low-latency event updates (e.g., AI detection flags, timestamped cues) and improved user responsiveness during live video analysis.
Optimized REST API calls for frame metadata and user interaction logs using dynamic pagination and conditional caching strategies, reducing redundant network requests by over 30%.

experience.description: Engaged in computer science research projects, contributing to algorithm development and data analysis.
achievements: Assisted in the development of novel algorithms for data processing and analysis.
Conducted experiments and analyzed results to validate research hypotheses.
Contributed to research publications and presentations.
Enhanced data visualization tools for complex datasets.

experience.description: Contributed to emerging product development and usability testing, focusing on enhancing user experience through data analysis.

Conducted comprehensive usability testing on emerging products, including metaverse technologies, utilizing A/B testing methodologies.
Improved user experience and satisfaction metrics by 15% through detailed analytics and feedback analysis.
Assisted in developing user-centric design strategies, focusing on wireframes and user journey mapping.
Analyzed user data with software analytics tools to identify trends and inform product enhancements.
Documented technical findings and methodologies, contributing to team knowledge-sharing and best practices.

projects.title: SafeLens
projects.description: AI-powered content safety, harmful content filtering, and compliance monitoring. This repository contains the source code for SafeLens, a platform for real-time content moderation using AI. It includes a Python backend powered by FastAPI and a pre-trained NLP model, along with a modern React frontend.
achievements: Developed an AI-powered platform for real-time content moderation and harmful content filtering.
Implemented a Python backend with FastAPI and a pre-trained NLP model for robust content analysis.

projects.title: manuvo
projects.description: Real-time ASL recognition, gesture interpretation, and accessibility intelligence. Manuvo is a modular AI-powered platform that recognizes American Sign Language (ASL) in real-time, provides feedback for learners, and enables accessible communication across personal, educational, and emergency contexts. Its core engine is built for image recognition, AWS Lambda serverless processing, responsive web/mobile layouts, mobile/iOS support, and real-time feedback, with extensions for creative spin-off applications.
achievements: Developed a modular AI platform for real-time American Sign Language (ASL) recognition.
Implemented gesture interpretation and provided real-time feedback for learners.
Designed for responsive web/mobile layouts with iOS support and AWS Lambda serverless processing.
Enabled accessible communication across personal, educational, and emergency contexts.
